name: Rabbit and go out / Room Escape Game
name_original: Rabbit and go out / Room Escape Game
description:
◇You can play for free.

◇Please tap where you are interested.

◇I got the item I found.

◇Tap an item icon and tap a specific place, you can use items.

◇It can be cleared in 10 to 15 minutes.

◇The application version has hints.
